formatted_address: Aft, Tagore Dr, Thomson Nature Park, Singapore
name: Rambutan Trail

reviews.text:
üçíThe short but interesting Rambutan Trail located near the Main entrance of Thomson Nature Park routes around the former Rambutan Plantation.
üçíAlong the trail, vistors are treated to the ruins of the former villagers residences, with information boards to their stories and the several fruit trees around.
üçíA former Rambutan Plantation's water source can also be found at the trail.
üçíDon't miss out on this tranquil and shady trail when visiting the Nature Park.

vicinity: Aft, Tagore Drive, Thomson Nature Park
